hackathon-requirements: Be sure to submit all materials here (code, slides, etc.) by the deadline of Friday at 9am. You may continue to edit your presentation materials until 10:30am.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The grand prize for the team with the highest total score
The best team that thinks outside the box
The best team with a solution that impacts the organization's strategy
The idea that has the most remarkable impact to AbbVie's business
Team with the best functioning product/software

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Atkins Building, 1801 S 1st St, Champaign, IL 61820, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Solutions should be unique and outside the box
AbbVie's Strategy: Sustainable growth and addressing the world's pressing health challenges
Solutions should make an impact and bring something new the AbbVie's business
Prototypes should completely function during demos

hackathon-location-address: Atkins Building, 1801 S 1st St, Champaign, IL 61820, USA
hackathon-description-header: Create a prototype solution broadly related to patients, disease, and drugs.
hackathon-location-description: Research Park - University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
